Cont.ost:
Welcome to the course Learn Java by Example. This course aims to teach the basics of Java programming language.

To facilitate your understanding of the content, this course is organized into modules, lessons, and topics. It is recommended that you proceed linearly, using the Back and Next buttons provided at the bottom right corner of the interface. If you wish to review your learning, you may access specific topics easily by using the Menu button. Any time during your learning, should you need assistance on how to navigate and interact within this course, click the Help button.
